001package com.technototes.library.util;
002
003/** Class with various math functions
004 * @author Alex Stedman
005 */
006public class MathUtils {
007
008    /** Get the max of supplied doubles
009     *
010     * @param args The doubles
011     * @return The max
012     */
013    public static double getMax(double... args) {
014        double max = args[0];
015        for (int i = 1; i < args.length; i++) {
016            max = Math.max(max, args[i]);
017        }
018        return max;
019    }
020
021    /** Get the max of supplied ints
022     *
023     * @param args The ints
024     * @return The max
025     */
026    public static int getMax(int... args) {
027        int max = 0;
028        for (int i = 1; i < args.length; i++) {
029            max = Math.max(args[i - 1], args[i]);
030        }
031        return max;
032    }
033
034    /** Calculate pythagorean theorem of any number of sides
035     *
036     * @param vals The sides
037     * @return The hypotenuse
038     */
039    public static double pythag(double... vals) {
040        double total = 0;
041        for (double d : vals) {
042            total += d * d;
043        }
044        return Math.sqrt(total);
045    }
046
047    /** Constrain the supplied int
048     *
049     * @param min The minimum of the constraint
050     * @param num The number to constrain
051     * @param max The maximum of the constraint
052     * @return The constrained number
053     */
054    public static int constrain(int min, int num, int max) {
055        return num < min ? min : (num > max ? max : num);
056    }
057
058    /** Constrain the supplied double
059     *
060     * @param min The minimum of the constraint
061     * @param num The number to constrain
062     * @param max The maximum of the constraint
063     * @return The constrained number
064     */
065    public static double constrain(double min, double num, double max) {
066        return num < min ? min : (num > max ? max : num);
067    }
068
069    /** Calculate if the supplied number is prime
070     *
071     * @param number The number to check
072     * @return If number is prime
073     */
074    public static boolean isPrime(int number) {
075        for (int i = 2; i <= number / 2; i++) {
076            if (number % i == 0) {
077                return false;
078            }
079        }
080        return true;
081    }
082
083    public static double map(
084        double x,
085        double in_min,
086        double in_max,
087        double out_min,
088        double out_max
089    ) {
090        return (x - in_min) * (out_max - out_min) / (in_max - in_min) + out_min;
091    }
092
093    public static double closestTo(double d, double... values) {
094        int lowestDif = 0;
095        for (int i = 1; i < values.length; i++) {
096            if (Math.abs(values[lowestDif] - d) > Math.abs(values[i] - d)) lowestDif = i;
097        }
098        return values[lowestDif];
099    }
100
101    public static int closestTo(double d, int... values) {
102        int lowestDif = 0;
103        for (int i = 1; i < values.length; i++) {
104            if (Math.abs(values[lowestDif] - d) > Math.abs(values[i] - d)) lowestDif = i;
105        }
106        return values[lowestDif];
107    }
108}
